page.title: 02A CHILD'S DAY
page.content: On Friday I get up at 7.00 and get dressed. After breakfast I clean my teeth. At 8.50 our dad drives us to school.After the whistle we have assembly and then we go to the dining room and watch TV. It's called "History All Around Us". After that at 10.35 we have playtime. Later we have an hour's work. Some are fast workers so they can read for a few minutes. We go over for dinner at 12.00 and go out to play at 12.30. When we come in at 1.15 we have a little time's work. At 2.45 Mrs. Miller reads us our story. At home time my brother Ben and I walk home on our own. Charles follows us soon. Then I watch TV or play with Ben until tea time.After tea Charles goes to a club and comes back at 9.00. I get in my nightie and then I clean my teeth, then go to bed.
